titleStmt.title: A discription of a monstrous Chylde, borne at Chychester in Sussex, the. xxiiii. daye of May. This being the very length, and bygnes of the same. M. CCCCC. LXII.
titleStmt.author: D., John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Leonard Askel for Fraunces Godlyf.,
publicationStmt.date: In the yeare of oure Lorde, 1562.

notesStmt.note: Woodcut, with letterpress verse. Cf. STC.
Verse: "When God for synne, to plage hath mēt ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
